messages.subject: Life Learning magazine
messages.msgSnippet: Wow...do I love this magazine!  (http://www.lifelearningmagazine.com/) I ordered one back issue and the current one and I m sold...I also ordered Live Free
messages.messageBody:
Wow...do I love this magazine! (http://www.lifelearningmagazine.com/)
I ordered one back issue and the current one and I'm sold...I also
ordered Live Free Learn Free so now I'm set. The day the magazines
arrived was like Christmas for me! I carry them around all day, from
room to room and grab a minute here and there to read the articles.
Wow. It's just so wonderful reading about other folks that think like I
do and have wonderful advice about the being the parent I'm trying to
be. Plus I've spent tonight checking out various links from within the
mag. Naomi Aldort's website has wonderful articles to read and I just
ordered her book. I can't read enough about unschooling and since my
online time is pretty hit or miss I cherish print on paper that I can
read at the kitchen table or while nursing a baby. I don't worry about
these ending up in the trash/recycle bin...I'll be holding on to these
in my library :-)

Just fyi,
Amy in WV
